title: Gustave Caillebotte Paris Street; Rainy Day Reversible Rain Cape
description:
Reversible Rain Cape developed from Gustave Caillebotte Paris Street; Rainy Day, 1877, from the Art Institute of Chicago’s collection.

Our Caillebotte Paris Street reversible rain cape is pack-able, rainproof, windproof and lightweight. Hidden double-sided magnets to prevent sleeves from billowing during windy conditions. Rain cape can fold up into a travel pouch with snap-on strap for your tote, car, briefcase or travel bag.  One size fits most; two shell buttons for adjustable fit.  Reverses to black.

  1. Size: One size fits most.
  2. Dimensions: Shoulder to wrist: 23 x 55 in., Neckline to back hem: 30 in.
  3. Materials: 100% polyester
  4. Machine Wash Gentle Cycle, Hang Dry.
